sources.title: The Three Stooges in Three Little Beers
sources.description: Short 11 In theatres 11/28/1935 The stooges are hired to deliver beer, but when they go to deliver beer to a golf course, they get distracted and play a round of golf.

metadata.Plot: The stooges are inept deliverymen at a brewery. When they learn about a company golf tournament, they sneak onto a golf course to get some practice. They quickly proceed to bother the other golfers and destroy the course. Forced to escape in their beer truck, more havoc ensues when the load of beer barrels are spilled out down a steep hill.
metadata.Actors: Moe Howard, Larry Fine, Curly Howard
